summary: This mod adds Balthier the leading man of Final Fantasy XII to the Winking Skeever in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Balthier, Ranged Pirate Follower[/size][/color][/font]


[font=Times New Roman][size=4]
This mod adds Balthier (my best attempt at a faithful rendition of him) to Skyrim. You can find him waiting for you at the Winking Skeever in Solitude. 

He comes  equipped with a crossbow and 300 exploding dwarven (shock) bolts, and is a missile/ranged fighter but will switch to using his dwarven dagger if needed. 

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color]


[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Unique Voice (MaleSoldier/Gideon Emery - same VA as FFXII) [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Weak base armor (meaning he will wear whatever you give him!)[/size][/font]
[/list][size=3][color=#ffff00][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]
Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits:[/size][/color][/font]

[/color][/size][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Kalilies & Stealthic for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdo's[/url][/size][/font]
[*][color=#ffff00][size=3][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Cloudedtruth for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul[/url]﻿[/size][/color][/font][/size][/color]
[/list][size=3][color=#ffff00]

[/color][/size][font=Arial][color=#ff0000][size=4]*Final Note: Armor previously seen in screenshots is NOT included with this mod, you will need to download it [url=http://reachthepinksky.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-74.html ]elsweyr[/url][/size][/color][/font]
author: AedanStarfang
